They removed my number as home phone number so the two factor authorization for your account should be removed with me as a blocker. Could
take up to 48 hours to take effect.
Email address for paperless billing is Rob.moyer@gmail.com. Pending validation from you to your email.
Set up for Auto pay on BofA. I think joint account.
Address is still 1210 but you can change in your app.
Moved Max and Adrian to my account
Confirmed you still have premium plan and msft discount applied.
Removing me as authorized user. I can no longer access account or make changes.
